oai_dc:dc.dc:title: PARAMETRIC REPRESENTATION OF A WIND-WAVE FIELD
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Rye, Henrik
Svee, Roald
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: wind wave field
parametric representation
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: The applicability of various spectral shape parameters is discussed. The wave .height distribution from 60 actual wave recordings is computed and compared to the Rayleigh distribution. The behaviour of various wave period parameters is discussed. Based on results from field data as well as numerical computations, it is concluded that some of the spectral wave parameters frequently used today may not be suitable for characterizing the wave field.
oai_dc:dc.dc:source: Coastal Engineering Proceedings; No. 15 (1976): Proceedings of 15th Conference on Coastal Engineering, Honolulu, Hawaii, 1976.; 11
